TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it granted as a better wish!

Articles.Content:
Its just like the corrupted one, but this time your wish comes out better then it actualy was!

I wish for Pirates Online Rewritten.
buhmp ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Granted. They remake it, for a holographic simulator, and they build such facilities all over the world, for free access so that all can enjoy it.

I wish that the frustrations about Pluto nomenclature would be resolved.

Granted. Pluto becomes the only planet in the solar system.

I wish for Cake.

Edited: Da heck? how did this get here?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-27T11:02:12Z" title="02/27/2015 11:02  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 27, 2015</time> by Sidereus**

Granted. It tastes like the most awesome thing in the world.

I wish for Kerbal Space Program Multiplayer!

Granted. It is 100% griefer-free!

Friendly moderator notice:

> 
> buhmp ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Contentless bump posts are against our community rules. Don't do this again.

I wish for a new car.

Granted. We got you a Tesla Model S.

I wish I could play the piano better.

granted, you are now composing master pieces

I wish I had a better computer.. than my 2.2ghz ....

Granted. It's a top-level gaming computer, with all the latest equipment. And on top of it, a steam gift card. $50.

I wish my cat wouldn't scratch me all the time.

Granted. Your cat also learns to do dishes and takes care of that for you.

I wish more drivers used turn signals.

Granted. They also don't leave their high-beams on all the time.

I wish I could tell the difference between a pen that's working and one that's not instantly. (Nothing more annoying than getting one to write something and finding out it doesn't work)

Granted pens no longer run out of ink

i wish for A NUKE

Granted. You get 10000000000000000 free nukes and a whole new planet to test them on.

I wish for Kerbal Space Program Multiplayer!

Granted. It comes out and works flawlessly, even including support for a mode in which multiple players can each operate one Kerbal, doing EVA's and operating the ships.

I wish that there occurred at a manageable safe (but very close) distance a supernova, which begins to be noticeable while the star is actively being monitored.

Granted. A video is taken of it so it is saved and is analysed and shown to public.

I wish for pizza.

granted. FREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE INFINEEEEEEEEETEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE PIZZA!!!!!!!!!!!

I wish for green iron crown to return.

Gran... wait NO.. NO!

I wish for a private server hardware and a awsome computer.

Granted. The computer runs at 1000000000000000 FPS per second and never lags.

I wish for Danny2462 to talk to me.

Granted, that happens *and* you get to meet Scott Manley.

I wish I could do anything in any game ever.

Granted. You also get a free copy of every game ever!

I wish for a global economy with a single, well managed currency.

Granted, Instead money is abolished and you have perfect Marxism.

I wish for green light rep!

Granted. You get IRL rep instead.

How did you get so much rep anyway? \*envy intensifies\*

I wish for a model railroad.

Granted. It's 1:1 scale!

I wish for a space elevator.

Granted, not only does it elevate but it can also move laterally!

Mythbusters, I used magic.

I wish that RIC gets his username changed to red instead of green.
